import "./VideoDetails.scss" function VideoDetails(props){ function formatTime(timestamp){ const date =new Date(timestamp); return date.toLocaleDateString('en-US',{ month:'2-digit', day:'2-digit', year:'numeric' }) } return( <>
{props.video.id}
{/*

{props.video.title}

*/}

By{props.video.channel}

{props.video.timestamp}

{props.video.views}

{props.video.likes}

{props.video.description}

Comments

{props.video.comments.map(comment => (

{comment.name}

{formatTime(comment.timestamp)}

{comment.comment}

))}
) } export default VideoDetails
